title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.4 - Window displays
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.4 - Window displays

State Regulations

Wholesale or winery premises where wine is sold at
retail, may in the discretion of the State Liquor Authority, have a show window
and may display wine in a manner consistent with the provisions of subdivision
4 of section
104
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, but may not accentuate or emphasize the sale of wine at
retail. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
63.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
